page.title: 04THE CHURCH
page.content: The church is situated on a hill overlooking Kilchrenan Village with lovely views of Ben Cruachan, the surrounding hills and Loch Awe. It is a Presbyterian Church of Scotland. We share our minister for the linked charges of Muckairn, Kilchrenan and Dalavich. Being a presbyterian church the financial and pastoral affairs are managed by a "Kirk Session" composed of lay members. The kirk session is represented at the Presbytery of Lorne and Mull which is responsible to the Synod of Argyll, which in turn is responsible to the General Assembly of the Church of Scotland. Many people visiting this area have signed the visitors' book. Some have come from other parts of the world to search for their ancestors.
